none: Four women standing in front of a building; one holds a child and an open book; a second holds an open book
The robe worn by the woman at the left matches those in 1N:47:t
Originally contained in an envelope (1N:45:t/DW_01840) with the caption "6, 7, 8. Okitipupa. Football. Goats. Turkeys"
Edward Harland Duckworth photographs--People--Three or more persons

Edward Harland Duckworth (1894 -1972) was a British expatriate officer who was the founding editor of Nigeria magazine. Collection consists chiefly of photographic prints and slides documenting early 20th century Nigeria.
